item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hey there! 👋

I’m Sam - a software engineer working and living in the San Francisco Bay Area, California 🌁. Born in Canton, China 🐉 and raised in Toronto, Canada 🍁, I’ve been shaped by a mix of cultures and experiences that fuel my curiosity and perspective.

When I’m not deep into code, I’m usually diving into the joys of family life with my two kids 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦, hanging out with our cats 🐈‍⬛, or spending quality time with my spouse. Teaching my kids, exploring new hobbies, and just having fun with them is one of my greatest joys. I’m a huge fan of history, science, and engineering, and I love geeking out about soccer (or football, depending on where you’re reading this from). Oh, and speaking of soccer - GO Arsenal F.C.! ⚽️
